message.raw:
Use new zprocess functionality to share log paths by name to child processes.
Otherwise, programs running with subprocesses on different computers will
create additional log files with unrelated filepaths on the computer running
the top-level process.
message.html:
Use new zprocess functionality to share log paths by name to child processes.
Otherwise, programs running with subprocesses on different computers will
create additional log files with unrelated filepaths on the computer running
the top-level process.
